text: @NikkiHaley @standamericanow We are doomed without Dr. Fauci. Trump's lack of Coronavirus pandemic action makes him responsible for over 137,000 deaths (Independent, Democratic, Green, Libertarian, Peace & Freedom, & Republican) I want them to live! Our trump must step up & help to control this Coronavirus!
